item.description:
I am near 40. I have spent quite a time in the software industry, not as long as “Uncle” Bob Martin of cause, but have also seen some technologies come and go. Words like this was in favor once: Delphi, Java, HTML, JavaScript, PHP… Plus my beard is making me look like wise one ðŸ™‚

In my past I have designed and developed standalone and client - server applications C++/Python, with databases like Oracle DB, PosgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite. Created applications serving CRM, web automated order processing, simulation of technological operation of railroad rolling stock.
